title: The Marqvesse of Argyle, his speech concerning the King, the covenant, and peace or warre betweene both kingdomes also a letter to the Parliament of England from Mr. Marshall, some votes past in Scotland, and the particular parties which would engage against England, and who are against it.
author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
